data.message: Everyone should have access to the Internet and its wealth of resources. Thanks to Facebook for taking this huge step forward on their behalf!!  Kudos to your researchers!

replies.message: We appreciate the encouragement, Dianne. Thanks for being part of our community! -Jessica

IK HOORDE DAT JULLIE MENSEN VAN DE SITE AF GOOIEN  VIEZE GORE KANKER GASTEN KRIJG DE TERING MET JE HELE FAMILIE  ERBIJ  DUIDELIJK !!!!!!!
Einde chatgesprek
dit kreeg ik van de heer van dalen kan ik hier iets tegen doen hij valt meer mensen lastig
Too bad China will shoot them down with lasers in the same way they already do to satellites

I wish the world itself could be connected like the Facebook "world". Learning from each other rather than alienating each other. You all are doing such amazing things! Anyone want to run for President? There is still time before November to stop this madness!
As long as they don't continue down this path of censorship and bias partisanship.
John Gasper I was thinking the same thing. I wonder what "party" they are promoting and who is filling their pockets with money. they are doing this to fill an agenda, not free the world.
I do, happily, join in congratulating Facebook for their great job in fostering better "State-of-the-art", affordable, communications' facilities to remote areas' dwellers. Great community work!
